content:
alexcrichton closed issue #1121:

This comment hasn't been answered to, and I don't think there are good reasons to loosen validation, and we'd need to implement it later again. Was there actually any good reasons to do so?

cc @alexcrichton @sunfishcode

alexcrichton commented on issue #1121:

I believe that this is no longer as applicable as it once was, so I'm going to close this.
